title: Sirens And Sounds - A True Friend Stabs You In The Front - 2008
description:
The debut album from Lewis Mason, AKA Sirens And Sounds. 

01 A Song For Cynicism
02 Forever Endeavours
03 Stories Aren&#039;t Worth Getting Killed For
04 Moshi Moshi
05 I Know, I Know
06 The Uninspiring
07 Pacing The Floorboards
08 Stones In Your Shoes
09 Bitter By Design
10 Every Breath I Take
11 There Is Always A Light
12 This Is Not A Photo Opportunity
13 Cloud Nine, How&#039;s The Weather Up There

"it&#039;s been a long road to finishing, but I&#039;ve done it and created an album I&#039;m happy with. :)

In this download, you get all thirteen songs in .mp3 format, full size artwork, lyrics and information, and insights behind the writing and recording of all thirteen tracks.  Pretty awesome for free?  Well no, it&#039;s fair, because I don&#039;t want to charge money for something that costed me little to nothing to make on such a lo-fi vibe.

-Lewis x"

NB: this isn&#039;t my album.
